1169456.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then destroy 1 card you control. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Attack" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
1169456.name: Meklord Army Attack

1169458.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Meklord Army" monster from your Deck or GY, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Carrier" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord" monster, reduce the ATK/DEF of all monsters on the field by half of their original ATK/DEF.
1169458.name: Meklord Army Carrier

1169463.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 "Meklord" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Guard" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord Emperor" monster, if that monster would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 card equipped to it, instead.
1169463.name: Meklord Army Guard

1169453.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 "Meklord" card in your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Top" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card gains the following effect: 
● Once per turn: You can equip this card with 1 "Meklord" card from your hand or GY.
1169453.name: Meklord Army Top

1168817.effect: Until the next End Phase, while you control exactly 1 "Meklord Emperor" or "Meklord Astro" monster, treat all monsters that are in the Extra Deck or that were Summoned from the Extra Deck as Synchro Monsters for the effects of your "Meklord" cards. You can target 1 Spell/Trap card you control; add this card from your GY to your hand, then destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Protocol Update" once per turn.
1168817.name: Meklord Protocol Update

1169445.effect: Destroy 1 other "Meklord" card you control, then Special Summon 1 "Meklord" monster with a different name from your Deck. If this card is destroyed: You can activate the effects of "Meklord Emperor" and "Meklord Astro" monsters you control as Quick Effects until the next End Phase. You can only activate 1 effect of "Meklord Quickboot" per turn, and only once that turn.
1169445.name: Meklord Quickboot

1169470.effect: If you control exactly 1 "Meklord" monster in Attack Position: Activate as Chain Link 2 or higher; that monster is unaffected by effects activated before this card in this Chain, then change it to Defense Position. If your opponent controls a Synchro Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "Meklord Sentry Mode" per turn.
1169470.name: Meklord Sentry Mode

1957466.effect:
You can Tribute this card; apply 1 of these effects.
● You can reveal 1 "Isolde, Belle of the Underworld" and 1 "Tristan, Knight of the Underworld" from your Deck, then add 1 of those revealed monsters to your hand, also send that other revealed monster to the GY.
● Add 1 "of the Underworld" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand.
During your opponent's End Phase, if this card is in your GY, except the turn this card was sent to there: You can attach this card to 1 Zombie "Number" Xyz Monster you control as material. You can only use 1 "Perceval, Knight of the Underworld" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1957466.name: Perceval, Knight of the Underworld

1957401.effect: Banish 2 cards from your hand or field; add 1 of your face-up banished cards to your hand, except "Early Opening of the Sarcophagus" or the cards banished to activate this card's effect. You can only activate 1 "Early Opening of the Sarcophagus" per turn.
1957401.name: Early Opening of the Sarcophagus

1957432.effect: Discard 1 card; during the End Phase of the next turn, destroy 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Future Sight" per turn.
1957432.name: Future Sight

1958133.effect: Send 1 Zombie monster with 0 DEF from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, you can Normal Summon 1 "of the Underworld" Monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) Monsters sent to the GY by this effect cannot activate their effects while they are in the GY. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters or activate monster effects the turn you activate this card, except Zombie monsters and their effects. You can only activate 1 "Knights of the Underworld" per turn.
1958133.name: Knights of the Underworld

1957398.effect: Shuffle 10 of your banished cards into the Deck; draw 2 cards. You cannot activate "Pot of" Normal Spells the Duel you activate this card, except "Pot of Relief". You can only activate 1 "Pot of Relief" per turn.
1957398.name: Pot of Relief

1957423.effect: If the equipped monster is a monster you control, any battle damage it inflicts to your is opponent is doubled. If not, any battle damage it inflicts to you is halved. If this face-up card is sent from the field to the GY: Pay 800 LP; place this card on either the top or bottom of your Deck.
1957423.name: Sun Mirror Shield

1958136.effect: Add 1 Zombie monster with 0 DEF from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card and send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C23: Lancelot, Knight King of the Underworld" by using 1 "Number 23: Lancelot, Dark Knight of the Underworld" you control with no materials attached to it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use 1 "Round Table of the Underworld" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1958136.name: Round Table of the Underworld

1957404.effect: Send 1 face-up Continuous, Equip, or Field Spell you control to the GY; draw 2 cards, then, if you activated this effect during your opponent's turn, reveal the drawn cards to your opponent, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with the same name as the revealed cards. You can only activate 1 "Trap Planter" per turn.
1957404.name: Trap Planter

1957406.effect:
"Armed Samurai - Ben Kei" + "Maha Vailo"
During each Battle Phase, this card can make attacks on monsters up to the number of Equip Cards you control +1. This card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Equip Card you control. During the Battle Phase and your opponent's turn, while this Fusion Summoned card is equipped with 2 or more cards, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can only control 1 "Ben Kei, the Armed Spellsword".
1957406.name: Ben Kei, the Armed Spellsword

1957988.effect:
3 Level 9 monsters
This Xyz Summoned card can attack your opponent directly. While this card has material, your opponent cannot target it with card effects. If this card has "Number 23: Lancelot, Dark Knight of the Underworld" attached as material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the effect.
1957988.name: Number C23: Lancelot, Knight King of the Underworld
1957988.treated_as: Number C23: Lancelot, Knight King of the Underworld

1953934.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Earthbound" monster from your GY to your hand. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthbound" monsters. "Earthbound" monsters cannot be destroyed by their own effects. You can Tribute this card to target 1 card your opponent controls; send it to the GY. You can only activate each effect of "Idol to the Earthbound Immortal" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Idol to the Earthbound Immortal" face-up on your field.
1953934.name: Idol to the Earthbound Immortal

1953925.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Earthbound" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Earthbound Ethereoglyph". You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthbound" Monsters While you control Level 10 or higher "Earthbound" monster, this card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. If an "Earthbound Immortal" monster is Summoned: You can target 1 card your opponent controls: if it is a Set card, it cannot be flipped face-up while you control this card, OR, if it is a face-up card, its effects are negated until the next End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Earthbound Ethereoglyph" once per turn.
1953925.name: Earthbound Ethereoglyph

1954082.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Earthbound" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. While an "Earthbound Immortal" monster is on the field, this card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthnound" monstersIf a card you control is Tributed: You can Special Summon 1 "Earhbound Token" (Rock-Type/Tuner/DARK/Level 2/ATK 1300/DEF 1300) on your side of the field. That token cannot be used as Link or Synchro Material, except for the Summon of an "Earthbound" monster. You can only activate each effect of "Tower of the Earthbound Immortal" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Tower of the Earthbound Immortal" face-up on your field.
1954082.name: Tower of the Earthbound Immortal

1954201.effect: While you control a face-up Field Spell OR you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthbound" monsters. This card is treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an "Earthbound" Monster. If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon OR by the effect of an "Earthbound" monster: You can target 1 "Earthbound" card you control: It cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects until the End Phase. You can only resolve each effect of "Earthbound Hound Ccoshobar" once per turn.
1954201.name: Earthbound Hound Ccoshobar

1954147.effect: If you control an "Earthbound" monster OR a face-up Field Spell: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthbound" monsters. This card is treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an "Earthbound" Monster. If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon OR by the effect of an "Earthbound" monster: You can target 1 "Earthbound" card you control: It cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects until the End Phase. You can only resolve each effect of "Earthbound Earthbound Slave Ukupacha Callao" once per turn.

1956265.effect: There can only be one face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. This card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn (Quick Effect), you can banish 1 "Earthbound" monster you control or your GY to target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. If this card leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect; return all cards banished by this effect to their owner's GY, then draw 1 cards.

1959488.effect: There can only be one face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. This card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn (Quick Effect), you can Tribute 1 monster you control; Destroy 1 card your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 500 Damage to your opponent.

1954198.effect: 1 "Earthbound" Tuner + 1+Non-Tuner DARK monsterIf this card is Synchro Summoned while you control a Field Spell: You can target 1 "Earthbound" Spell/Trap card in your GY: Add it to your hand. This card is treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an "Earthbound" Monster. If you only control "Earthbound" Cards: You can Normal Summon 1 "Earthbound" monster from your hand in addition to your Normal Summon or Set. You can only activate each effect of " Earthbound Messanger Huacachina" once per turn
1954198.name: Earthbound Messanger Huacachina

1954163.effect: 1 DARK Tuner + 1+ Non-Tuner "Earthbound" monstersThere can only be one face-up Level 12 "Earthbound" Synchro monster on the field. (Quick Effect) Once per turn, if a card or effect is activated; Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

1954232.effect: 1 "Earthbound" MonsterIf this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Earthbound" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Earthbound Beast Llama Pacuilla" once per turn.
1954232.name: Earthbound Beast Llama Pacuilla

852790.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished monsters in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish 1 card from each GY. You can only use each effect of "Abulata" once per turn.
852790.name: Abulata

905499.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can reveal 1 "Amazoness" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck and take 1 card whose name is specifically listed on that card, or 1 card that specifically lists such a card in its text, and either add it to your hand or send it to the GY. If this card in your Main Monster Zone leaves the field: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Amazoness Gryphon" once per turn.
905499.name: Amazoness Gryphon
905499.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, you can negate an activated card effect that targets another "Amazoness" card(s) you control, then destroy this card.

1785670.effect: If this card on the field is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Dark Hole" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Dark Hole Emissary". During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY and reveal 1 "Dark Hole" card from your hand; destroy 1 monster you control, and if you do, banish up to 3 card from your opponent's GY. You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Emissary" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1785670.name: Dark Hole Emissary

811901.effect: If your opponent's monster declares a direct attack during a turn where your opponent has conducted multiple Battle Phases: Exchange your current LP with your opponent's current ones, also, for the rest of this turn, your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken.

1333987.effect: If 4 or more cards you control were sent to the GY this turn: Banish all cards on the field, then each player can Special Summon 1 monster from their hand, but the monster with more ATK cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Amended Will" once per turn.

426186.effect: When your opponent Special Summons a monster while they control 3 or more monsters: Banish all face-up monsters they control.

749590.effect: Until the end of your next turn, neither player can Summon monsters to, nor activate Spell/Trap Cards in, the column this card was activated in. If your opponent controls 2 or more cards in a column where you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand in that column. You can only activate 1 "Cageforce Limiter" per turn.
749590.name: Cageforce Limiter

1768996.effect:
Destroy this if you have more LP than your opponent does. If your opponent gains LP: Inflict the same amount of damage to them, and if you do, they must send 1 card they control to the GY (if possible). You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Curse of Overconfidence" per turn, and only once that turn.
● During the turn this card was sent from the field to the GY, if you take damage: You can add 1 "Curse of Overconfidence" from your Deck to your hand.
● During your Main Phase: You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent gains 200 LP for each card on the field.
1768996.name: Curse of Overconfidence

1872289.effect: During your opponent's turn: Neither player can activate cards or effects on their next turn. During the Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; gain LP equal to the turn count x 500. You can only use this effect of "Curse of Turn" once per turn.

972805.effect:
2 Level 3 monsters
(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card and target 1 monster on the field; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK or DEF (your choice). If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 other FIRE monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine" once per turn.

1218579.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, exept "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner"; Special Summon that target in Defense Position. 1218579.name: Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner

1218310.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return the target to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Shadow the Moonlight Assassin" once per turn.

1218342.effect: When a "Blackclaw" monster is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck wit a highter ATK to your hand. 1218209.effect: All "Blackclaw" monsters on your field gain 100 ATK/DEF for each Blackclaw Counter on the field. 1218423.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY. You can only use 1 of followings effects of "Blackclaws Rest" once per turn.
● if a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect; gain LP equal to that monster's original DEF, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck.

● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; ATK/DEF target's become equal to its combined original ATK and DEF until the end of this turn, and if the target is in Attack Position at the End Phase, change the target in Defense Position.

1218767.effect: If you control a "Blackclaw" monster: Target Set cards in your opponent's field, up to the number of "Blackclaw" monsters you control; destroy them. If you control min. 2 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.

1219456.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven
1219456.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven

1957225.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb" monster from your hand or GY, except "Catacomb Battalion Bennu". During your Main Phase: You can destroy monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of "Catacomb" monsters on the field with different names, except "Catacomb Battalion Bennu" (max. 2). If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Mounted" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Battalion Bennu" once per turn.
1957225.name: Catacomb Battalion Bennu

1957240.effect: When a monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can increase the ATK of 1 monster you controls, up to the number of "Catacomb" monsters on the field with different names x1000, except "Catacomb Battalion Bennu", until the End Phase (max. 2). If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Mounted" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Battalion Brahm" once per turn.
1957240.name: Catacomb Battalion Brahm

1957234.effect: During your Main Phase: You can destroy Set your opponent controls, up to the number of "Catacomb" monsters on the field with different names, except "Catacomb Battalion Fury" (max. 2). If you have 3 or more "Catacomb" cards in your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, shuffle 1 "Catacomb" card from GY into the Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Catacomb" monsters. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Mounted" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Battalion Fury" once per turn.
1957234.name: Catacomb Battalion Fury

1957201.effect: During your Main Phase: You can destroy Spells/Traps your opponent controls, up to the number of "Catacomb" monsters on the field with different names, except "Catacomb Battalion Grahvym" (max. 2). If a "Catacomb" monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Catacomb" monsters. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Mounted" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Battalion Grahvym" once per turn.
1957201.name: Catacomb Battalion Grahvym

1957227.effect: This card can attack directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved. (Quick Effect): You can return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Catacomb" monster from your hand, except Catacomb Battalion Shi". If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Mounted" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Battalion Shi" once per turn.
1957227.name: Catacomb Battalion Shi

1957261.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a "Catacomb" card's effect. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 1 other "Catacomb" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck, when it leaves the field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; banish it. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished "Catacomb" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Mounted Doupon" once per turn.
1957261.name: Catacomb Mounted Doupon

1957270.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a "Catacomb" card's effect. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 1 other "Catacomb" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck, when it leaves the field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent's controls; halve its ATK, until the End Phase. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished "Catacomb" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Mounted Dreadnought" once per turn.
1957270.name: Catacomb Mounted Dreadnought

1957256.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a "Catacomb" card's effect. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 1 other "Catacomb" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck, when it leaves the field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; change its battle position. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Catacomb" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Mounted Gandiva" once per turn.
1957256.name: Catacomb Mounted Gandiva

1957281.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a "Catacomb" card's effect. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 1 other "Catacomb" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck, when it leaves the field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished "Catacomb" cards and or in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Mounted Jun" once per turn.
1957281.name: Catacomb Mounted Jun

1957276.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a "Catacomb" card's effect. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 1 other "Catacomb" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck, when it leaves the field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can take 1 "Catacomb" card from your Deck, and either place it on the top of your Deck or banish it. If this card is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Mounted Takeshi" once per turn.
1957276.name: Catacomb Mounted Takeshi

1957357.effect: When this card is activated: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your Deck to the GY. All "Catacomb" monster you control gain 100 ATK x its Level. If you Special Summon a "Catacomb" Fusion Monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Token" (Fiend/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1500/DEF 0). You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Advance" once per turn.
1957357.name: Catacomb Domain

1957364.effect: Fusion Summon 1 "Catacomb" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If your opponent controls a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, you can also use 1 "Catacomb" monster in your Deck or Extra Deck as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Catacomb Eruption" once per turn.
1957364.name: Catacomb Eruption

1957362.effect: Target 1 "Catacomb" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then if you Special Summon a Level 5 or lower monster by this effect, you can add 1 "Catacomb" card from your GY to your hand, except "Catacomb Revival". During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle 1 "Catacomb" monster from your GY into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Revival" once per turn.
1957362.name: Catacomb Revival

1957322.effect:
1 Level 5 or lower "Catacomb" monster + 1 "Catacomb" monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending the above monsters you control to the GY (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Negate the activated effects of monsters your opponent controls in the same column as a "Catacomb" Fusion monster. If this card attacks, after damage calculation, inflict damage equal to the ATK of the attack target to your opponent. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Royal Angel" once per turn.
1957322.name: Catacomb Royal Angel

1957304.effect:
1 Beast-Warrior "Catacomb" monster + 1 "Catacomb" monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending the above monsters you control to the GY (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Gains 100 ATK for every "Catacomb" card in your GY. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Catacomb Token" to your opponent's field (Fiend/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1500/DEF 0), and if you do that, destroy that card. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Royal Mahees" once per turn.
1957304.name: Catacomb Royal Mahees

1957315.effect:
2+ "Catacomb" monsters, including at least 1 Fusion Monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending the above monsters you control to the GY (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Your opponent cannot target "Catacomb" monster you control with card effects. If a "Catacomb" monster you control attacks, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 3 cards in your opponent's GY; Banish them. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Royal Morgoth" once per turn.
1957315.name: Catacomb Royal Morgoth

1957292.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Catacomb" monster + 1 "Catacomb" monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending the above monsters you control to the GY (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Cannot be destroyed by battle. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a Special Summoned monster: You can destroy that monster. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Royal Volken" once per turn.
1957292.name: Catacomb Royal Volken

1957344.effect:
2+ "Catacomb" monsters
If a "Catacomb" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: That monster(s) gains 300 ATK/DEF. When a monster declares an attack: You can target 1 "Catacomb" monster in your GY or that is banished: Special Summon it. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Leader Cedric" once per turn.
1957344.name: Catacomb Leader Cedric

1957332.effect:
2+ "Catacomb" monsters
Your opponent cannot target "Catacomb" monsters for attacks, except this one. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Catacomb" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can shuffle any number of monster you control that this monsters points to into the Deck, then target the same number of cards your opponent controls; Negate their effects. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Leader Ravanna" once per turn.
1957332.name: Catacomb Leader Ravanna

1957557.effect:
2 "Catacomb" monsters
"Catacomb" monsters this card points to can make two attacks on monsters. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Catacomb" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; Fusion Summon 1 "Catacomb" Fusion Monster by banishing monsters from your hand or GY as Fusion Material. You can only use 1 "Catacomb Regal Khione" effect per turn, and only once this turn.
1957557.name: Catacomb Regal Khione

1403864.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can destroy 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control or in your hand, and if you do, add 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your hand, that specifically mentions "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" in its' text, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Apocrypha" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Annchimedes" once per turn.
1403864.name: Apocrypha Annchimedes

1403875.effect: If an "Apocrypha" card is destroyed, you can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Apocryphal Demon Token" (Fiend/FIRE/Level 6/ATK 1500/DEF 2400), also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your GY. You can use each effect of "Apocrypha Eukliade" once per turn.
1403875.name: Apocrypha Eukliade

1403871.effect: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Apocrypha" monsters: You can destroy 1 "Apocrypha" card you control or in your hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Ludesmicartes" once per turn.
1403871.name: Apocrypha Ludesmicartes

1403931.effect: If an "Apocrypha" monster is destroyed by the effect of an "Apocrypha" card: Send 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control or in your hand to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can banish 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck, except "Apocrypha Oinstair". If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Oinstair" once per turn.
1403931.name: Apocrypha Oinstair

1403934.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Apocrypha" monsters from your GY. "Apocrypha" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. You can target 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control, and 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy them. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; shuffle 5 banished "Apocrypha" cards with different names into your Deck; Draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Oniphia" once per turn.
1403934.name: Apocrypha Oniphia

1403912.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK as long as an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster is face-up on the field.. You can only use each of the following effects of "Apocrypha Onizar" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Apocrypha" monsters.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck; add 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 "Apocrypha" card.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck; Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card's name and effects becomes that card's, and its' ATK becomes equal to that monster's.
1403912.name: Apocrypha Onizar

1404699.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon". Must be Ritual Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be used as Fusion or Link Material. (Quick Effect) You can banish any number of "Apocrypha" cards from your GY, then target an equal number of cards your opponent controls; destroy them. When this card leaves the field; Destroy all cards you control. If this Ritual Summoned card is in your GY, and you control an "Apoctypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your hand, then send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your hand to your GY. You can only use each effect of "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" once per turn.
1404699.name: Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity

1404705.effect: If you control "Apocryphais The Evil Serpent Deity", target 1 banished "Apocrypha" monster; Special Summon that monster. If an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster is Special Summoned by this effect, its' effects are negated, and it is sent to the GY during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; Add 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Apocryphal Al-Mighty Descent" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404705.name: Apocryphal Al-Mighty Descent

1404707.effect: When this card is activated, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster; send 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your GY, then destroy 1 card in your hand. "Apocrypha" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponents' card effects. You can banish this card from your GY; You can target 2 cards you opponent controls; return them to the hand, then banish 1 card you control. Your opponent can pay 1000 LP to negate this effect. You can only use 1 effect of "Apocryphal Manuscripts of Apocryphais" per turn.
1404707.name: Apocryphal Manuscripts of Apocryphais

1404703.effect: Discard 1 card; Add 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster and 1 Level 4 or lower "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your hand, then banish 1 "Apocrypha" card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY: Send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your GY. You can only use 1 "Chosen by the Apocryphal Deuce" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404703.name: Chosen by the Apocryphal Deuce

1405234.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity". You must also Tribute 2 or more "Apocrypha" monsters with different names from your hand or field whose total ATK equal or exceed 3500. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 non-Ritual "Apocrypha" monster from your GY. You can only use 1 effect of "Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon" per turn.
1405234.name: Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon

1404711.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control an "Apocrypha" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. You can banish this card from your GY; add to your hand 1 of your "Apocrypha" monsters that is banished or in your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Apocrypha" monsters. You can only use 1 "Apocryphal Annihilation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404711.name: Apocryphal Annihilation

1404716.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only use 1 of "Apocrypha Forbidden Alchemy" per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can target 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control; destroy it, then your opponent must give control of 1 monster they control to you. That monster's name becomes "Apocryphal Sacrifice", and it's effects are negated. 
● You can banish 1 card from your hand; draw 1 card.
● You can banish this card from your GY; Send 2 "Apocrypha" cards from your Deck to your GY.
1404716.name: Apocryphal Forbidden Alchemy

1591016.effect: 2 "Apocrypha" monstersYou can banish 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY; Set 1 "Apocrypha" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apoctypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" and 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. You can only use 1 effect of "Apocryphal Descendant Archenem" per turn, and only once that turn.
1591016.name: Apocryphal Descendant Archenem

1894025.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. You can discard this card; add 1 "Queltz" card from your Deck to your hand. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Ritual Summon 1 "Queltz" monster from your hand or GY, by Tributing this card as the entire Tribute. You can only use 1 "Cradle Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1894025.name: Cradle Queltz

1892644.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished cards and 1 of your opponent's banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, then change 1 face-up monster on the field into face-down Defense Position. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Sacred Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1892644.name: Sacred Queltz

1892708.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 3 of your opponent's face-down banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, banish 1 card in this card's column, face-down, then banish this card your next Standby Phase. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Hallowed Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1892708.name: Hallowed Queltz

1893258.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): Your make your opponent shuffle 2 of their banished cards into the Deck, then, have your opponent draw 1 card and banish 1 card from their hand, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Fury Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893258.name: Fury Queltz

1893760.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can target 7 banished cards; shuffle all 7 into the Deck, and if you do, negate the effects of that opponent's monster, also, during the End Phase, if it is in the same column, banish it, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Nova Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893760.name: Nova Queltz

1892679.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished cards and 2 of your opponent's banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, then your opponent banishes 3 cards from their GY, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Divine Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1892679.name: Divine Queltz

1893271.effect: Your opponent banishes 1 random card from your hand, face-down, then, you add 2 "Queltz" Ritual Monsters from your Deck to your hand with different Levels. If this card is in the GY: You can target 1 "Queltz" monster you control; banish this card from your GY, face-down, then that target gains 200 ATK for each face-down banished card. You can only use 1 "Queltz Crowning" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893271.name: Queltz Crowning

1892646.effect:
This card can be used to Ritual Summon any FIRE Thunder Ritual Monster. You must also banish cards from the top of your Deck, face-down, equal to the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If this card is in your GY: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 FIRE Thunder Ritual Monster in your GY; banish this card from your GY, face-down, and if you do, add that target to your hand.
● Banish 1 other card from your GY, face-down; add this card from your GY to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Queltz Dagger" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck the turn you activate this card.
1892646.name: Queltz Dagger

1892736.effect:
Reveal 1 "Queltz" Ritual Monster in your hand, then activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; place it on the top of the Deck.
● Ritual Summon the revealed monster from your hand, by paying LP equal to its DEF.
You can only activate 1 "Queltz Storm" per turn.
1892736.name: Queltz Storm

1892731.effect: If you control a "Queltz" Ritual Monster: Target 2 cards your opponent controls in different columns; destroy all your opponent's cards in the Main Monster Zones and Spell & Trap Zones in those columns, also those zones cannot be used until the end of their next turn. You can only activate 1 "Queltz Fright" per turn.
1892731.name: Queltz Fright

1893606.effect: Declare different card names, up to the number of "Queltz" Ritual Monsters you control; for each of those declared card names, your opponent must reveal and banish 1 copy of that card from their Deck, face-down, if possible. Then, for each declared card they did not banish from their Deck, you must banish the top 3 cards of your Deck, face-down. You can only activate 1 "Queltz Paranoia" per turn.
1893606.name: Queltz Paranoia

1893375.effect: Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can make each player banish 1 card they control, face-down, if possible, except "Queltz Dominance". Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must banish the top 5 cards of your Deck, face-down (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed. You can only control 1 "Queltz Dominance".
1893375.name: Queltz Dominance

1894071.effect:
3 Level 3 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Legion Queltz" by revealing 1 "Queltz" card in your hand, then using 1 Normal Summoned monster, or 1 Ritual Monster, you control as material. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you Special Summon this card, except FIRE Thunder monsters. If you control no other monsters: You can target 1 banished card; attach it to this card as material. You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Queltz" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Legion Queltz" once per turn.
1894071.name: Legion Queltz

1589386.effect: If a "de la foret" monster is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 1000 ATK/DEF. Destroy all monsters with 0 ATK or DEF.
1589386.name: Althea de la foret

1589426.effect: If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "de la foret" monster: You can add 1 Level 1 "de la foret" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cherry de la foret" once per turn.
1589426.name: Cherry de la foret

1589434.effect: If this card attacks: You can add 2 Level 1 "de la foret" monsters from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Daisy de la foret" once per turn. At the Start of the Damage Step, if a "de la foret" monster battles an opponent's monster, that monster loses ATK equal to your monster's ATK.
1589434.name: Daisy de la foret

1589449.effect: You can discard 1 "de la foret" card; Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 "de la foret" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Dawn de la foret" once per turn. All "de la foret" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF.
1589449.name: Dawn de la foret

1589401.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "de la foret" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Iris de la foret" once per turn.
1589401.name: Iris de la foret

1589417.effect: If you control a "de la foret" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You cannot summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "de la foret" monsters, for the rest of the turn you use this effect.
1589417.name: Pearl de la foret

1589468.effect: Target 1 "de la foret" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; The 2nd target loses ATK equal to the attack of the 1st target, and if the 2nd target's ATK becomes 500 or less, Draw 1 card.
1589468.name: Motitus de la foret

1589489.effect: You can Normal Summon/Set 1 "de la foret" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) All "de la foret" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF.
1589489.name: Sapling de la foret

1589491.effect: You can discard 1 "de la foret" card; Draw 2 cards, then all "de la foret" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use 1 "Spring Rebirth de la foret" per turn.
1589491.name: Spring Rebirth de la foret

1589472.effect: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Althea de la foret" from your Deck to your hand. All "de la foret" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can reveal any number of "de la foret" cards in your hand, shuffle them into the Deck, and Draw the same number of cards you shuffled. If you shuffled your whole hand this way: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 1000 ATK/DEF. You can only use each effect of "Yggdrasil de la foret" once per turn.
1589472.name: Yggdrasil de la foret

1618530.effect:
2 monsters, including a "de la foret" monster
If a "de la foret" monster is Summoned to a Zone this card points to: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; that monster's ATK becomes 0, and if it does, monsters with that name cannot activate their effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Iona de la foret" once per turn.
1618530.name: Iona de la foret

1589514.effect:
1 non-Link "de la foret" monster
Once per turn: You can target 1 "de la foret" monster; it gains 500 ATK, then, if its ATK is greater than 2500, you can Special Summon 1 "de la foret" monster from your hand. You can only use the effect of "Kaillie de la foret" once per turn.
1589514.name: Kaillie de la foret

1589519.effect:
2 "de la foret" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 "de la foret" monster from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase, if this card was sent to the GY this turn: You can add 1 "de la foret" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Nia de la foret" once per turn.
1589519.name: Nia de la foret

1589533.effect:
2+ "de la foret" monsters
If this card's ATK is higher than it's original ATK: You can make this card's ATK become its original ATK, then you can target 1 Spell/Trap card on the field; draw 1 card, and if you do, destroy that target. You can only use this effect of "Tenille de la foret" once per turn.
1589533.name: Tenille de la foret

1589543.effect:
2+ "de la foret" monsters, including a Link Monster
When this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "de la foret" Spell card from your Deck to your hand. If this card's ATK is higher than it's original ATK: You can make this card's ATK become its original ATK; lower the ATK of all monsters your opponent controls by the ATK this card lost. You can only use each of these effects of "Zenevieva de la foret" once per turn. Destroy all monsters with 0 ATK or DEF.
1589543.name: Zenevieva de la foret

1100050.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects. If you control no Effect Monsters in Main Monster Zones, you can activate both effects in sequence instead.
● Shuffle 1 card that currently has its effects negated into the Deck.
● Special Summon 1 "Dhin Token" (Spellcaster /Wind /Level 3 /ATK 1500 /DEF 1500).
You can only activate 1 "Magenic Body Dhin" per turn.
1100050.name: Magenic Body Dhin

1100022.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects. If you control no Effect Monsters in Main Monster Zones, you can activate both effects in sequence instead.
● Special Summon 1 "Din-La Token" (Spellcaster /Water /Level 3 /ATK 1500 /DEF 1500). 
● Target 1 Spell that is face-up on the field, banished, or in the GY; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Magenic Body Din-La" per turn.
1100022.name: Magenic Body Din-la

1100033.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects. If you control no Effect Monsters in Main Monster Zones, you can activate both effects in sequence instead.
● Special Summon 1 "Ma-Dri Token" (Spellcaster /Earth /Level 3 /ATK 1500 /DEF 1500). 
● Target 1 Monster that is face-up on the field, banished, or in the GY; negate its effects until the end of this turn. 
You can only activate 1 "Magenic Body Ma-Dri" per turn.
1100033.name: Magenic Body Ma-dri

1100027.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects. If you control no Effect Monsters in Main Monster Zones, you can activate both effects in sequence instead.
● Special Summon 1 "Tahir Token" (Spellcaster /Fire /Level 3 /ATK 1500 /DEF 1500).
● Target 1 Trap that is face-up on the field, banished, or in the GY; negate its effects until the end of this turn. 
You can only activate 1 "Magenic Body Tahir" per turn.
1100027.name: Magenic Body Tahir

1099990.effect: Shuffle 1 "Magenic" Continuous Trap from your hand or field into the Deck; add 1 "Magenic" Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand, also this cards name becomes that of the shuffled Trap's, and this card's effect becomes that Trap's original effect. These changes last until the end of the turn. Tokens you control gain 100 ATK/DEF for every face-up "Magenic" Card on the field.
1099990.name: Magenic Field

1100017.name: Free Magenic Flow

1100012.effect: Can be activated from your hand if you control no face-up Trap Cards. You can Tribute 1 monster; draw 1 card, also, until the end of this turn, Tokens you control cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use this effect of "Magenic Vessel of Dhin" once per turn.
1100012.name: Magenic Vessel of Dhin

1099998.effect: Can be activated from your hand if you control no face-up Trap Cards. You can discard 1 "Magenic" Spell from your hand; this effect becomes that card's effect when that card is activated, also, until the end of this turn, Tokens you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. You can only use this effect of "Magenic Vessel of Din-la" once per turn.
1099998.name: Magenic Vessel of Din-La

1100008.effect: Can be activated from your hand if you control no face-up Trap Cards. You can shuffle 1 of your banished "Magenic" Normal Spells into the Deck; this effect becomes that card's effect when that card is activated, also, until the end of this turn, Tokens you control are unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. You can only use this effect of "Magenic Vessel of Ma-Dri" once per turn.
1100008.name: Magenic Vessel of Ma-dri

1100005.effect: Can be activated from your hand if you control no face-up Trap Cards. You can banish 1 "Magenic" Normal Spell from your Graveyard; this effect becomes that card's effect when that card is activated, also, until the end of this turn, Tokens you control are unaffected by your opponent's Trap effects. You can only use this effect of "Magenic Vessel of Tahir" once per turn.
1100005.name: Magenic Vessel of Tahir

1099995.effect: Can be activated from your hand if you control no face-up Trap Cards. Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up card on the field; its effects are negated while this card is face-up on the field. If that target leaves the field: Special Summon 1 "Unbound Token" (Spellcaster /Light /Level 3 /ATK 1500 /DEF 1500) to your opponent's field. You can only use each effect of "Magenic Bindings" once per turn.
1099995.name: Magenic Bindings

1100064.effect:
1 Token
Cannot be used as Link Material. You can only control 1 "Guardian of Magenic Flow". This monster on the field is also treated as a Token. Gains 500 ATK for every other Token on the field. Once per turn (Quick Effect): Tribute 1 monster you control; add 1 "Magenic" card from your Deck to your hand, then you can set 1 "Magenic" Trap from your hand, also it can be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Guardian of Magenic Flow" once per turn.
